name: Arcane Battles
description:
PUZZLE AND BATTLE MIX!

Arcane Battles is an incredibly addictive elements matching fun with tons of collectible creatures!

************************
Join a guild, chat with your friends, explore endless dungeons and fight epic battles! Or challenge other players and or see who is the strongest in our PvP Arenas!
Collect fantastic arcane creatures, powerful demons and steam robots, build your own army and make your way to the top!

Arcane Battles is FREE TO PLAY - you can enjoy it as long as you want and new content is always coming!

JOIN NOW - and get extra crystals!

************************
FEATURES:
- Addictive and easy battle system - but can you truly master it?
- Collect hundreds of awesome monsters, magical creatures and robots!
- Explore vast world with over 250 dungeons to conquer!
- Battle your Facebook friends online in our Arenas!
- Summon other heroes to help you in combat and earn rewards!
- Join a Guild or become a Guild Master yourself!
- Chat with your friends!
- Participate in weekly Events and look for new hidden areas!

************************
5/5 "A clever mix of collectable adventure and addictive chain battles."
5/5 "Easy to learn, yet hard to master - this game can get you hooked! "
5/5 "Even though the game is challenging, you always feel that you can beat it."
